Catalano.Imaging.Filters

Class Grayscale

  • java.lang.Object
    • Catalano.Imaging.Filters.Grayscale
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IBaseInPlace

    public class Grayscale
extends java.lang.Object
implements IBaseInPlace
    Base class for image grayscaling.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Grayscale

        public Grayscale()
        Initializes a new instance of the Grayscale class. In this constructor, will be 0.2125B + 0.7154G + 0.0721B.

      • Grayscale

        public Grayscale(double redCoefficient,
         double greenCoefficient,
         double blueCoefficient)
        Initializes a new instance of the Grayscale class.
        Parameters:
        redCoefficient - Portion of red channel's value to use during conversion from RGB to grayscale.
        greenCoefficient - Portion of green channel's value to use during conversion from RGB to grayscale.
        blueCoefficient - Portion of blue channel's value to use during conversion from RGB to grayscale.

      • Grayscale

        public Grayscale(Grayscale.Algorithm grayscaleMethod)
        Initializes a new instance of the Grayscale class.
        Parameters:
        grayscaleMethod - Methods for grayscaling.
